General.Name: Guangdong Jialong Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Jialong Food Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells food products in China. The company offers chicken powder, essence, juice, and other chicken products, as well as tomato sauce, custard powder, green mustard sauce, and corn japonica. It offers its products under the Jialong, Fuwei, Hong Kong Kitchen, Taitai Kitchen, Jiafeng, Lion Ball, and EAS brands. Guangdong Jialong Food Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Puning, China.
General.Address: No. 0138, Minhong Industrial Park, Puning, China, 515343
